// this code was auto-generated by the WinUserParser tool
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

using Windows.Win32;

namespace AssyntSoftware.WinMessageConverter;

internal static class LazyProvider
{
    private static readonly Lazy<Dictionary<uint, string>> Provider = new Lazy<Dictionary<uint, string>>(() => 
    {
        (uint Key, string Message)[] list = new[]
        {
            <insert messages>
        };

        Dictionary<uint, string> dictionary = new(list.Length);

        foreach ((uint Key, string Message) in list)
        {
            if (dictionary.TryGetValue(Key, out string? value))
                dictionary[Key] = $"{value}, {Message}";
            else
                dictionary.Add(Key, Message);
        }

        return dictionary;
    });

    internal static Dictionary<uint, string> MessageDictionary => Provider.Value;
}
